mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1906 Wedding Picture of Rev. Jacob Marshall Tise and Alice Sheffey (Peterman) Tise
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 963_JM & Alice Tise; Studio portrait of Tise couple in wedding garb Married in Floyd Sept. 19, 1906 Picture made in Woodstock some time after that. She has on her wedding dress.
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
